text:
Hello all ,
I am looking for an option to add just count in the ecommerce bridge manually . Is it possible at all?Also there are just four default ecommerce stores available while creating bridge in HubSpot. Is It possible to integerate other ecommerce stores like whmcs ?
Thanks!
ok but why it isn't managed by the EB sync message... what is the purpose of a DELETE call if it doesn't DELETE?
no clue, the docs arent very helpful and there isnt really any support for this API it seems :disappointed:
